item.title: India's power output rises at fastest pace in five months on industrial boost

review.headline_rewrite: India's power output rises at fastest pace in five months on industrial boost
bullets: Power demand during the September and December quarters is expected to be higher after a weak June quarter, as the monsoon subsides this month
